import './ProductCard.css' import { Button, Card } from "react-bootstrap" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { AuthContext } from './../../context/auth.context' import { useContext } from 'react' const productCard = ({ _id, imageUrl, title, owner }) => { const { user } = useContext(AuthContext) return ( {title}
Ver detalles {owner && owner === user?._id && }
) } export default productCard
